```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)

data <- read_csv("data/round1_voting.csv") %>%
  clean_names()

```


```{r}

data <- data %>%
  group_by(pnm_first_and_last_name) %>%
  summarise(avg_score = mean(score_1_5)) 

# we have 104 left if you filter for above 3.5, we have 85 left if we filter for
# above a 4

data %>%
  arrange(desc(avg_score)) %>%
  filter(avg_score >= 4)

hist <- data %>%
  arrange(desc(avg_score)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = avg_score)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  geom_vline(xintercept = mean(data$avg_score), col = "red") +
  theme_classic()
```
